title: Software Developer 2
description: Design, develop, troubleshoot, and debug software programs for databases, applications, and networks.  Requires experience in software engineering and Linux systems.  Part of a team maintaining core compute services.
requirements: BS degree in Computer Science or related field
Understanding of Linux operating systems and administration
Experience automating tasks with Java, Python, Bash, JavaScript
Experience working in an operational environment with mission-critical services

title: Software Engineer
description: Assists in the design, development, and testing of cloud computing applications. Collaborates with senior engineers to meet client needs.  Requires experience in software development and cloud computing.
perks_and_benefits: Volunteer time off program (40 hours paid)

title: System Engineer (OS)
description: Seeking a System Engineer with expertise in Windows Server, IIS, MSSQL, Apache Tomcat, and APM tools like BigPanda and Datadog.  Responsibilities include system support, troubleshooting, and implementation.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Windows 2016, 2012, and 2008 server
Microsoft Technology Stack – browser, .NET, IIS 7/8, MSSQL Databases, Apache Tomcat
Knowledge of DFS and SAN technologies (NetApp)
Knowledge of MSSQL database structure and queries
Understanding of DevOps Practices and Principles
